subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] How to handle "er" and "ur" in QS
msgSnippet: ... Hi Oliver, Thanks for the feedback. Did you ever get that font working? I emailed the font list, and the developer gave me an easy way to fix the problem
messageBody:
oliver langan wrote:
>
>
> I agree the 'ir' sound in bird sounds a little different than of the
> 'ar' in arena (when I say them). In fact, I wonder if the 'r' semivowel
> might not just stand on its own: Bay Roar Day. But that definitely
> codes more towards my pronunciation than, say, RP.
>

Hi Oliver,

Thanks for the feedback. Did you ever get that font working? I emailed
the font list, and the developer gave me an easy way to fix the problem
(so we hope); I made small changes and uploaded them to the files->
fonts section.

Paul
